adHeader: DOG AND CAT PET SITTER IN YOUR HOME - LEARN MORE AT MY WEBSITE
adDetails: I will be your peace of mind while you are away from home . . . because I will love your pets while you are gone!! Hi, my name is Elke and I offer a full spectrum of pet care services in your home. Please visit my website to find out more about my rates and services offered. I service Walnut Creek, Pleasant Hill, Concord, Clayton, Lafayette and Alamo and parts of Martinez I am fully insured - proof of insurance will be provided upon request. References are also available. I am able to give pets their oral medications as well as subcutaneous fluids and injections. Learn more about me and my philosophy at: a href="http://www.wildelkanddomesticatedpetcare.com">www.wildelkanddomesticatedpetcare.com Thanks for your interest - rest assured your pets will be in good hands!! Elke Mulgrew Wild Elk and Domesticated Pet Care show contact info
